translations: n.[光][分化][物] 光谱测定法，[光] 度谱术

phrs.translation: 原子发射光谱法；原子发射光谱学

sentences.sentence: On-line liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry is a high throughput method for the analysis of small molecules in biofluids.
sentences.translation: 在线液相色谱-质谱联用法是一种高通量的方法，用于分析生物流体中的小分子。

sentences.sentence: A ultra performance liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry(UPLC-MS/MS) method was developed for determination of altrenogest and chlormadinone in swellfish.
sentences.translation: 研制出了测定河豚中烯丙孕素和氯地孕酮的超高效液相色谱-串联质谱检测方法。

sentences.sentence: The team is using an imaging system based on mass spectrometry to detect swathes of signals at the same time.
sentences.translation: 研究团队利用质谱分析仪成像系统同时侦测众多信号。
